title: Not understanding that there is no single company behind it all

story.text: For anything to work, it has to be run by a company, or a foundation, or the government or some other kind of legal entity, right?
Federated social networks can be run by anyone. There's no requirement to form a company or to have a business model.

item.title: Not understanding that there is no single company behind it all

item.text: For anything to work, it has to be run by a company, or a foundation or some other kind of _legal entity_, right?
